text: Visit our campus and enjoy Trevecca’s southern hospitality, its vibrant city, and welcoming community. Come see for yourself why Trevecca is such a great place to call home.

Trevecca’s campus is surrounded by beautiful and exciting Nashville, Tennessee. Known as the “Athens of the South” and “Music City USA,” the city of Nashville is home to 20 institutions of higher education, so “college life” in Nashville really describes a large part of the city. Trevecca students enjoy the small community feel of the campus along with opportunities that only a large city can offer—internships in major corporations, an outstanding arts community, sports and music venues, and much more. Trevecca has much to offer students who want to attend a smaller university where they can be part of campus life and still be part of a large metropolitan area. Trevecca’s beautiful campus is approximately one mile from the heart of downtown Nashville. We hope you will visit us and our city soon.
Undergraduate Individual & Family Campus Visit Registration

Individual campus visits are for prospective high school and transfer students who want to visit the campus as an individual, or with family and friends. Your campus visit will include a walking campus tour and an opportunity to meet with your admissions and financial aid counselors. Classroom visits are optional and contingent upon availability. If you would like to meet with a professor while you are on campus, please make those notations on the registration form.

Enroll in an incredible college experience at a Christian university in the heart of Nashville. With a commitment to quality education, faith and community, students grow not only in their chosen fields, but as whole people. Choose between over 100 academic programs and find your new home at Trevecca.

Offering 19 master’s programs and two doctoral programs led by highly credentialed faculty, Trevecca can help you gain the skills and expertise you’re looking for. Choose a face-to-face or entirely online graduate program that helps you reach your goals.

Whether you’re just starting your higher education journey, have a desire to finish your degree, or want to take your education to the graduate level, Trevecca Online can meet the needs of busy students at all degree levels. We’ll help you reach your goals without pausing your life.

It’s never too late to finish your degree. Offered one night a week or entirely online, Trevecca offers degree completion programs at the associate and bachelor level. We take care of all the details so you can focus on what’s important—earning your degree!

Founded in 1901, Trevecca is committed to holistic education, encouraging students to grow intellectually, socially, emotionally, physically and spiritually. Located approximately one mile from thriving downtown Nashville, Trevecca provides a liberal arts education while guiding students to find God’s calling on their lives through traditional undergraduate programs, continuing and graduate studies and online offerings. With students from 47 states and 25 countries, Trevecca offers 18 associate degrees, 71 undergraduate bachelor's programs, 16 master’s degrees and three doctoral programs, as well as specialist and certificate programs.

Trevecca Association of Business Professionals Service Leadership Series presents Mission with a Business: The Five Pillars of Mission that Drive Increases in Capacity and Outreach. The event will be held on Wednesday, Feb. 19, 2020 from 11 a.m. to 1 p.m. at the Boone Business Building Convocation Center.

Alumnus and former Sony Music executive to lead Trevecca’s School of Graduate and Continuing Studies

Longtime educator, innovator and music industry executive Dr. Dean Diehl will serve as the new academic dean of Trevecca Nazarene University’s School of Graduate and Continuing Studies, Trevecca officials announced today. Diehl, who earned a
Social work program recognized as a top-rated program in the state

As the need for qualified social workers continues to grow, Trevecca is dedicated to training graduates ready to enter the field, one of the fastest-growing in the country, according to the U.S. Bureau of

Trevecca is a private, four-year liberal arts university offering associate’s, bachelor’s, master’s, and doctoral degrees. Our programs of study are fully accredited—92% of Trevecca faculty hold the highest academic degrees in their field. With more than 100 academic programs to choose from, there is no limit to the paths you might follow in search of God’s purpose for your life.

Trevecca prides itself on being one of the best values in Christian higher education. We work hard to keep our charges below the national average for private universities, and more than 99% of our students receive financial aid. Trevecca is dedicated to making the Christian university experience available to everyone.

At Trevecca, you get more than just an education -- you get a community. Here, you will find professors who care and invest in the lives of their students. You will form friendships over late night pizza and attend on campus events like Friday Night Live and Paint-a-palooza that will keep you laughing. Most important, you will experience worship and a love of God that will transform you.
. See for yourself if Trevecca is in God’s plan for your life. We look forward to helping you discover that plan and what role Trevecca might play.
